memberdef.argsstring: (hid_t group, const char *name, const char *unit, int type, int arraylength, real confac, integer *mask, integer size, real *orbits)
memberdef.name: hdf5_orbit_writeset

briefdescription.para: Helper function for writing orbit diagnostic datasets.

parameterdescription.para: HDF5 group where dataset is written
name the data is wrote with
unit the the data is wrote with
is data double (0), int (1), or integer (2)
length of the orbit data array
unit conversion factor orbits is multiplied before writing
flag array indicating which elements in orbits array contain data

briefdescription.para: Write orbit diagnostics data to a HDF5 file.

parameterdescription.para: path to group which is created here and where the data is stored
array storing the orbit data (format same as in init() in diag_orb.c)

briefdescription.para: Module for writing orbits diagnostics data to a HDF5 file.
